job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: <strong>Job Title:</strong> Senior Software Engineer<br><br><strong>Location:</strong> Philadelphia, PA or New York, NY<br><br><strong><u>Required Technology And Skills<br></u></strong><ul><li>5 years of software development experience with focus on web-based applications and full-stack development for both customer facing UI and backend services</li><li>Experience developing software in LAMP stack with PHP preferable utilizing Symfony.</li><li>Experience developing with a UI framework, Ember.js preferred or React and Anuglar </li><li>Experience with Linux configuration</li><li>Some experience with different PHP runtimes </li><li>Hands on experience with relational databases – MySQL preferred. Prefer database design and query development</li><li>Experience maintaining and improving distributed systems<br></li></ul><strong><u>Nice To Have Skills<br></u></strong><ul><li>Experience developing a REST API.</li><li>Knowledge of Docker and containers.</li><li>Experience working with AWS services </li><li>Experience with CI/CD preferred Jenkins<br></li></ul><strong><u>Salary And Compensation<br></u></strong><ul><li>$120,000-$140,000</li><li>Bonus<br></li></ul><strong><u>Benefits And Perks<br></u></strong><ul><li>Ability to work remote</li><li>401K match<br></li></ul><strong><u>Client<br></u></strong><ul><li>Our client is a Fortune 500 firm that specialize in software solutions for the edtech and health tech space<br></li></ul>Please email jpillion@talener.com for more information or to apply.
